domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: many argue that the White House is w/holding helpful accoutrements (swabs, activating agents, PPE, vaccines) 4 the sake of body count during a bid 4 re/election. Would anybody do that? Would u re-elect someone that had a significant mortality count during a pandemic..? 🤷
